underlying_goal: Implement the A-2 Delta intermediate layer pattern for a Reverse ETL architecture PoC in Databricks, including config, setup, streaming job, and data generator files
friction_detail: Used PyYAML which caused Databricks auto-dependency resolution errors; first fix (commenting out pip install) didn't work, had to switch entirely from YAML to JSON.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a Delta intermediate layer streaming pipeline for Databricks; implementation was completed but required two rounds of fixes to resolve a PyYAML dependency error before final success.
